scripts.prebuild: npx prisma migrate up --experimental -c && npx prisma migrate up --experimental -c npx prisma generate && node ./prisma/seed
scripts.docker:clean: npm run clean:images && npm run clean:volumes
scripts.migrate:save: docker exec -it app prisma migrate save --experimental -c
scripts.migrate:up: docker exec -it app prisma migrate up --experimental -c
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate:save && npm run migrate:up
